summary: Corfu is a Greek island in the Ionian Sea, known for its history and beautiful landscapes. It's one of the Ionian Islands and has been part of Greece since 1864. Before that, it was ruled by different powers, including Venice and Britain. The island has many ancient ruins, medieval castles, and a unique city surrounded by fortifications. Corfu's capital, also called Corfu, is a UNESCO World Heritage site. The island is famous for its first university, theater, and opera house in modern Greece. It's also a popular tourist spot.
title: Corfu
